title: Parisian Contemporary Comfort near the Exquisite Palace of Versailles
description: Perfectly located for those with the Palace of Versailles on their bucket list, the Holiday Inn Express Paris - Velizy, an IHG Hotel, is only a 15-minute drive away from this spectacular former royal residence. Start the day with a hearty breakfast and coffee at the onsite Express 51 Café & Bar before heading out to explore one of the most beautiful and romantic cities in the world, with central Paris easily accessible via bus or tram.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Paris - Velizy, an IHG Hotel
